name: Roll, Lock and Drop
description:
The rolling of the dice will move the available blocks around in the top bar.

-> Shifts blocks left
->-> Shifts blocks left x2
<- Shifts blocks right
<-<- Shifts blocks right x2
(blank) Does nothing

Roll the dice locking any in before re-rolling. Then position where you want the drop to happen (using your arrow keys) and watch the actions play out.

Match 3 blocks in a row or column to score points.

Notes
This  was built for the GameJam2022.

Help on web version is broken however you can also download the windows version on this page.

If I had more time I would have added animations,  prepopulated the grid with blocks and split the dropping from the playing the actions. That siad this was a solo effort so I am happy with the result in 48 hours.
